definition: to follow/to comply with/varying according to.../to allow/subsequently
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"

sentences.english: Tom is an easygoing type of person who gets along well with everyone.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆是那种随和的人，跟谁都合得来。

sentences.english: I am lively and cheerful, easy-going and generous, others frankly.
sentences.chinese: 我性格活泼开朗，随和大方，待人坦诚。

sentences.english: Huang is a small man with a firm handshake and an easy demeanor.
sentences.chinese: 身材矮小的黄伟握手有力，态度随和。

sentences.english: They are soft, good-natured, and easy-going.
sentences.chinese: 他们性情温柔，心地善良，宽容随和。

sentences.english: His mother was doting and easygoing.
sentences.chinese: 老盖茨的母亲对孩子比较溺爱，为人非常随和。

sentences.english: Being laid back will show everyone that you value yourself and that is sexy.
sentences.chinese: 随和一些会告诉别人你很看重自己，这是性感。

sentences.english: Hewas an easygoing man of very moderate views.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个有着温和观点性情随和的人。

sentences.english: With his usual easy-going demeanour, Liu arrived at the gate of the athletes village riding a bicycle.
sentences.chinese: 带着和往常一样的随和态度，达运动员村的大门。

sentences.english: It is easy for me to communicate with others , and teamworks.
sentences.chinese: 为人随和，善于与人交流，具有团队合作精神。

sentences.english: Eventually Darcy unbends a bit toward Elizabeth, and the two engage in ironic banter.
sentences.chinese: 终于，达西对伊丽莎白稍许随和了一些，两人也相互。

sentences.english: I am a friendly, warm-hearted, generous and easy going girl.
sentences.chinese: 我是一个友好，热情，大方，随和的女孩。

sentences.english: I character lively and cheerful, amiable and easy, treats people with candor.
sentences.chinese: 我性格活泼开朗，随和大方，待人坦诚。

sentences.english: If a person is too loyal, does not understand amiably , will repel other people.
sentences.chinese: 如果一个人太忠诚，不懂得随和，就会排斥他人。

sentences.english: People that are high in easygoingness are very relaxed, broadminded, and unaffected by change.
sentences.chinese: 随和的人十分放松，思维开阔，不易受变化影响。

sentences.english: At the party even the professors unbent and told jokes.
sentences.chinese: 在晚会上，连教授们也变得轻松随和，讲些笑话。

sentences.english: They are dependable, loyal and easygoing; very compassionate.
sentences.chinese: 他们很可靠，诚实和随和，非常有同情心。

definition: amiable and approachable (idiom); easy-going/modest and unassuming/(of writing) plain and simple/easy to understand
spacious and well-lit/open and clear/(of character) optimistic/cheerful/carefree
cultured and refined (idiom); gentle and cultivated
